physical_appearance: "The image shows the front cover of a book. It has a predominantly orange background. ""Tamils Festival 1980"" is stated at the top. ""1.3.80"" and ""National Theatre"" are stated at the lower left hand side. There are three lines of Tamil scripts. There is a drawing of a lady in a dancing pose which is red in colour
